last_episode_to_air.name: Four Years in One Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: Months after a family's contractor skipped out mid renovation, the dream house they've almost given up on is going to get finished in one day.

name: Instant Dream Home
overview: A team of rapid-fire renovators takes big risks and makes painstaking plans to transform families' homes from top to bottom in just 12 hours.

episodes.name: Baby on Board
episodes.overview: The team reworks a beloved family home to make it more accessible for a soon-to-be grandmother with vision loss and to create space for the new baby.

episodes.name: Schoolhouse Rock
episodes.overview: Daring maneuvers, including a backyard schoolhouse dropped in by crane, transform a couple's home into a haven for their five kids.

episodes.name: A Room with a View
episodes.overview: A firefighter EMT, the first person in his family to own a house, hasn't had time to make the bungalow he shares with his partner and mom a real home.

episodes.name: 9 is Enough
episodes.overview: A couple with nine kids would love to have more room and less clutter. A badly timed rainstorm throws a big wrench in the redesign plan.

episodes.name: Dirty Work
episodes.overview: The team comes up with an ambitious plan to make a couple's abode as stylish as they are and to create a fun-filled backyard wonderland.

episodes.name: Flowers in Bloom
episodes.overview: To give a single mom and her kids more space, the team pulls a bathroom out of thin air and revamps the yard with flowers and an outdoor theater.

episodes.name: The Art of Giving
episodes.overview: The crew makes a dramatic dash to the finish as they bring new light, a new look and a new art studio to a creative family's late-'80s home.

episodes.name: Four Years in One Day
episodes.overview: Months after a family's contractor skipped out mid renovation, the dream house they've almost given up on is going to get finished in one day.
